name: Nautical Nausea
description:
Surrounded by an enemy fleet, all you have are two cannons and a circular tower! You can only rotate by firing. Choose from 6 different weapons to suit your playstyle!

Note: If the game feels too hard, it might help to enable the laser pointer in the options menu.

Survive as long as possible, but don't get sea sick from your spinning tower!

Controls:
Left Click: Fire anti-ship weapon
Right Click: Fire anti-air weapon
Escape: Pause game

By MindHawk and Wesje101
Source code: https://github.com/MindHawk/GMTK-2020-Game-Jam
